    About Petar Angelov

    Hi, I'm Petar Angelov — a full-time full-stack software developer and passionate coder. I’m deeply enthusiastic about all things tech, and I find real joy in mentoring others. There’s nothing more rewarding to me than helping someone grow and watching them thrive.
